full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 753 Filed 08/10/22 Page 107 of 264 1533 LC7VMAX3 Carolyn - direct 1 A. Once. 2 Q. What happened that one time? 3 A. They were talking about the Shelby Cobra that he owned. 4 Q. That who owned? 5 A. Mr. Epstein. 6 Q. Where did that conversation happen? 7 A. In the driveway. 8 Q. Carolyn, did you ever drive yourself to Jeffrey Epstein's house even though you didn't have a license? 9 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. About how many times? 12 A. A few. 13 Q. When you went over to Jeffrey Epstein's house for massage appointments, where did you enter the house each time? 14 15 A. Through the kitchen. 16 Q. During the first few months when you were going over to that house for massages, who did you see when you first entered the kitchen? 17 18 A. Maxwell. 19 20 Q. What, if any, conversations do you remember having with Maxwell when you would meet her in the kitchen? 21 22 A. She would just let me know that Mr. Epstein would be back, he was on a jog or he was -- he'd be back any moment; I could go upstairs and set up. 23 24 Q.
